<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get dashboard by ID</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/perses-public/api/v1/projects/{folderId}/dashboards/{uid}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves a specific dashboard by its ID.


## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"in":"path","name":"dashboardId","required":true,"description":"The ID of the dashboard to retrieve.","schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Dashboard details

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"uid"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"dashboard-1"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"title"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"CPU usage"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"panels"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"refresh"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"5s"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"version"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"1.0.0"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"createdAt"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"2024-03-20T10:00:00Z"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"uid\": \"dashboard-1\",\n  \"title\": \"CPU usage\",\n  \"panels\": \"string\",\n  \"refresh\": \"5s\",\n  \"version\": \"1.0.0\",\n  \"createdAt\": \"2024-03-20T10:00:00Z\"\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
